text: 11:9 Phil 4:15-18Aduga eina nakhoiga leiminnaringei, eina awatpa leirakpa matamda eina nakhoida potlum puhankhide, maramdi Macedonia-dagi lakpa ichil-inaosing aduna eigi awatpa khudingmak pubirakkhi. Houkhiba matamda eina keidounungda nakhoida potlum oihankhide, aduga lakkadaba matamdasu keidounungda potlum oihanjaroi.
